row.process: :IF &$PLATFORM# = "UNIX" : IF &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" EOF : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#) : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : IF &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# NE "" sudo -k sudo -S -s -p '' <<EOF $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF : ELSE sudo -k sudo -s -p '' <<EOF $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF : ENDIF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX rm -f '&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE#' : ENDIF :ENDIF
